name: Shift Of Place
description:
This was a game I made for Deynum's Completion Jam. I made this game as a team of 2 with my friends (Hudson and Michael). The theme of the Jam was Out Of Place in case your confused. This was our first game jam so sorry about the bad itch page (i dont know how to make a good one).

WASD to move. 

Left click to attack.

Space to use/pickup.

Enjoy!
